description:
Description
The Forbes 2000 list is a ranking of the world's biggest
companies, measured by sales, profits, assets and market
value.
title: The Forbes 2000 Ranking of the World's Biggest Companies (Year 2004)

parameters.profits: the profit of the company in billion USD.
parameters.marketvalue: the market value of the company in billion USD.
parameters.category: a factor describing the products the company produces.
parameters.assets: the assets of the company in billion USD.
parameters.country: a factor giving the country the company is situated in.
parameters.name: the name of the company.
parameters.sales: the amount of sales of the company in billion USD.

format: A data frame with 2000 observations on the following 8 variables.
